request.description:
Users Signup

Possible Inputs:

  • sex : [Male, Female]
  • team: [Student, Staff, Talent, Contractor,.....]

Get Set of Mood Choices

Returns set of mood choices along with their respective set of reason choices.

Submit a Mood Choice

Possible Inputs

  • Value : [Happy, Content, Neutral, Sad, Angry]

Count the Number of Moods

Returns the number of moods within the specified filters

Can only be accessed by the admin

Request Pramaters: 

	filter  = {
		"team" : (type of user : [Student, Staff, ....]),
		"user" : (userId to count by a single user),
		"reason" : (reasonId to count by a specific reason),
		"date" : {
			"date" : (date),
			"timeUnit" : (period of time around the specified date, [day, month, year])
		}
	}

All filter fields are optional

Search Moods

Returns a list of moods within the specified filters

Can only be accessed by the admin

Request Pramaters: 

	filter  = {
		"team" : (type of user : [Student, Staff, ....]),
		"user" : (userId to count by a single user),
		"reason" : (reasonId to count by a specific reason),
		"date" : {
			"date" : (date),
			"timeUnit" : (period of time around the specified date, [day, month, year])
		}
	}
	
	page = (current page number)
	limit = (number of items in current page)
	sort = (filed to sort items by)

All filter fields are optional
Get Profile of current logged in user
Update Profile of current logged in user

Get Users by any Filter

Can only be accessed by the admin

Request Pramaters: 

	filter  = {
		"team" : (type of user : [Student, Staff, ....]
	}
	
	page = (current page number)
	limit = (number of items in current page)
	sort = (filed to sort items by)

All filter fields are optional

Get a single user

Can only be accessed by the admin

Get moods of the current logged in user

Request Pramaters: 

	filter  = {
		"reason" : (reasonId to count by a specific reason),
		"date" : {
			"date" : (date),
			"timeUnit" : (period of time around the specified date, [day, month, year])
		}
	}
	
	page = (current page number)
	limit = (number of items in current page)
	sort = (field to sort items by)

All filter fields are optional

Mood count of current logged in user

Request Pramaters: 

	filter  = {
		"reason" : (reasonId to count by a specific reason),
		"date" : {
			"date" : (date),
			"timeUnit" : (period of time around the specified date, [day, month, year])
		}
	}

All filter fields are optional

Get a list of team moods

Request Pramaters: 

	filter  = {
			"name" : (name of the required team)
	}
	
	page = (current page number)
	limit = (number of items in current page)
	sort = (field to sort items by)

All filter fields are optional

Get Graph

Request Pramaters: 

	filter  = {
		"team" : (type of user : [Student, Staff, ....]),
		"user" : (userId to count by a single user),
		"reason" : (reasonId to count by a specific reason),
		"date" : {
			"date" : (date),
			"timeUnit" : (period of time around the specified date, [day, month, year])
		}
	}

All filter fields are optional
